results.releaseNotes:
Thanks for playing this GameClub game!  GameClub offers a curated catalog of iconic games, with new titles released every week. Subscribers get access to unlimited gameplay, no ads, and no additional purchases — just pure fun.

This update contains bug fixes and performance improvements.  Let’s play!
results.description:
Jump into hook-swinging action and conquer the mountain with your trusty grappling hook. 

* 96 / 100 - Metacritic
* 5 / 5 - 148Apps
* 4 / 4 - Slide to Play
* 5 / 5 - AppSpy
* 4.5 / 5 - TouchArcade

Super QuickHook is the critically acclaimed sequel to the retro sidescrolling platformer classic Hook Champ. Use your grappling hook to race through gorgeous landscapes, survive a roaring avalanche, and discover secret loot to spend on character upgrades, equipment and fancy hats.  

Your grappling hook will let you cover wide expanses, while your rocket boots give you a soaring boost that can pull you out of certain death or help you reach a few mysterious locations. Handy mid-stage checkpoints help you mark your progress through the wildly challenging courses. Try out the all-new endless levels and see just how long you can stay ahead of a terrifying avalanche or the violent blast of an erupting volcano. The key to success comes from maintaining speed and momentum, which requires a careful eye and a very quick hook.

- Simple yet Deep: Tap and hold to fire your amazing grappling hook and let go to send yourself soaring through the air!

- Expansive Worlds: More than 20 levels intricately designed with multiple routes, secrets, and more!

- Awesome Upgrades: Spend your coins in the shop to improve your hook, upgrade your rocket boots, or even pick up a handy pedometer!

- Challenge the Endless Levels: Swing at high speed to stay ahead of a massive avalanche or an erupting volcano! How long can you survive?

- Quirky Characters: Chat with all of the strange characters who stop in at the shop!

- Super Secrets: With plenty of unlockable hats and characters, you'll have to try anything and everything to find it all! Did someone say something about a gnome?

Super QuickHook is one of the many fantastic games brought back to life by GameClub, fully updated to support the latest versions of iOS and newest devices.

**************************************************

GameClub is a subscription mobile gaming service. If you like our games, try our auto-renewing monthly subscription for 30 days free, and play all of our games with no limits, no ads, no hidden fees, and no other in-app purchases.
 
If you choose to purchase GameClub’s optional subscription, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. No charge will be made for the free trial period. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior of the current period, at the cost indicated. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your App Store account settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
